text: Colvale or Colovale is a census town in North Goa district in the state of Goa, India. ==Demographics== India census, Colvale had a population of 5475. Males constitute 55% of the population and females 45%. Colvale has an average literacy rate of 72%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 74% and, female literacy is 69%. In Colvale, 10% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==Notable people== *Antu Shenoy the forefather of Abbe Faria, Goan hypnotist *Wendell Rodricks (19560 - 2020) Indian designer and author of Moda Goa and The Green Room. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in North Goa district
title: Colvale
